mapper.select: SELECT cp.id id, cp.crafwork_id crafworkId, cp.param param FROM crafwork_param_plm cp WHERE cp.param NOT IN (SELECT tp.param_name FROM prod_crafwork_param_plm tp WHERE tp.mid_prod_no = #{midProdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND tp.crafwork_id = #{crafworkId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND tp.company_id = cp.company_id AND tp.deleted = 'F') AND cp.deleted = 'F' AND cp.company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND cp.crafwork_id = #{crafworkId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
